Not really; if they refuse to reinstate my financial aid I would get evicted and not have enough money to get back home. . . *BUT* I have their ass' number in that I talked to them on several occasions after my financial aid was dropped and thus if they refuse to correct it I could walk up right to the dean's office and get all of them potentially fired because they didn't just fuck up; they fucked up to the point I could sue them.

Tomorrow morning I'm going to walk right up to them be all polite and bring up how they broke the law and go, "I would much rather solve this politely and peacefully."
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537017da636872395c960000#post_537017da636872395c960000

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537018ce6368722ee2180000#post_537018ce6368722ee2180000
[bq="Whatevs"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5370139c63687245df1e0100#post_5370139c63687245df1e0100
explain the avatar.[/bq]
It's orin's sprite from touhou from the game "hopeless masquerade".  It's a reference the group that made it had a couple fan games that sometimes they work on official touhou fighting games and thus when they worked on hopeless masquerade they inserted a fanon reference.

Tl:dr; touhou reference.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53701a036368724384400000#post_53701a036368724384400000
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537018dc6368722f86110000#post_537018dc6368722f86110000
Well have fun then.[/bq]
Oh I don't have to worry; they've screwed up so many times that if they try to push me off to the side again I could straight up go, "Thanks for the help, but I really feel as though the dean could help with my situation" and he'll be there in ten minutes.  I'm going to be polite and stuff, but if they try to shove me aside their ass is grass.

topics.body:
This probably isn't the right thread for this, But can I just say.

You all know this, but the animation in MLP. Just. Wow. It is Really. Really. Really good! And I'm not saying that just because I like the show. I mean. It is good, especially considering it is done in Flash.

I've used flash. And seeing stuff like MLP coming from it, is REALLY impressive.
